item.title: Build native mobile packages from html/css/js app with PhoneGap Build cloud service
item.description: Note: PhoneGap and PhoneGap Build are going to be shut down General idea Startup with an html/js/css app. Build an APK from the front-end web app using PhoneGap Build cloud service. Unfortunatly Phonegap CLI fails for some weird reason, so the I had to manually zip it before posting it to the API (the API doesn’t fail but expects the zip up to where I got). Phonegap Build account Create an account in https://build.
